Mehdi Hmili, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Tunisia. A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye nduzi nke obere ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri Thala My Love, The Night of Badr na Li-La.
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Tunis, Tunisia
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na ntụziaka na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Manouba dị na Tunis, ọ kwagara France maka ọmụmụ ọzọ.
N'oge ndụ France, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Paris Film School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ duziri ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya X-Moment n'afọ 2009 na Li-La n'afọ 2011. Ihe nkiri ojii na ọcha a na-agba gburugburu ihe isi ike nke ịhụ n'anya
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndị nkatọ gasịrị, ọ duziri obere oge nke abụọ ya The Night Of Badr, ihe nkiri ọzọ ojii na ọcha banyere onye na-ede uri nwoke na nwoke
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'ọnwa Machị 2012.
N'afọ 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke obere ihe nkiri Offside
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2016, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ Thala Mon Amour
Ihe nkiri ahụ lekwasịrị anya n'obodo nta Thala n'oge mgbanwe Tunisia. E mechara wepụta ihe nkiri ahụ na ngwụcha afọ 2014 na France na Tunisia
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye na-ede uri a ma ama na Tunisia ebe o dere uri megide ọchịchị Ben Ali. O mekwara ihe nkiri 16mm abụọ, Instant Guilty na The Graduate
